018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.manager;
020
021import java.lang.ref.WeakReference;
022import java.util.Map;
023import java.util.Optional;
024import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
025import java.util.function.Function;
026import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
027
028/**
029 * A channel manager that maintains mappings from a key to channels
030 * using weak references. 
031 *
032 * @param <K> the key type
033 * @param <C> the generic type
034 */
035public class ChannelManager<K, C extends Channel> {
036
037    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.FieldNamingConventions",
038        "PMD.VariableNamingConventions" })
039    private final Map<K, WeakReference<C>> channels = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
040    private final Function<K, C> supplier;
041    private ChannelManager<K, C> readOnly;
042
043    /**
044     * Instantiates a new channel manager.
045     *
046     * @param supplier the supplier that reates new channels
047     */
048    public ChannelManager(Function<K, C> supplier) {
049        this.supplier = supplier;
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Returns the channel registered for the key or an empty optional
054     * if no mapping exists.
055     *
056     * @param key the key
057     * @return the optional
058     */
059    public Optional<C> get(K key) {
060        synchronized (channels) {
061            var ref = channels.get(key);
062            if (ref == null) {
063                return Optional.empty();
064            }
065            var channel = ref.get();
066            if (channel == null) {
067                // Cleanup old reference
068                channels.remove(key);
069                return Optional.empty();
070            }
071            return Optional.of(channel);
072        }
073    }
074
075    /**
076     * Returns the {@link Channel} for the given name, creating it using 
077     * the supplier passed to the constructor if it doesn't exist yet.
078     *
079     * @param key the key
080     * @return the channel
081     */
082    public Optional<C> channel(K key) {
083        return channel(key, supplier);
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Returns the {@link Channel} for the given name, creating it using
088     * the given supplier if it doesn't exist yet. 
089     *
090     * @param key the key
091     * @param supplier the supplier
092     * @return the channel
093     */
094    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AssignmentInOperand",
095        "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis" })
096    public Optional<C> channel(K key, Function<K, C> supplier) {
097        synchronized (channels) {
098            return Optional
099                .of(Optional.ofNullable(channels.get(key)).map(r -> r.get())
100                    .orElseGet(() -> {
101                        var channel = supplier.apply(key);
102                        channels.put(key, new WeakReference<C>(channel));
103                        return channel;
104                    }));
105        }
106    }
107
108    /**
109     * Removes the channel with the given name.
110     *
111     * @param name the name
112     */
113    public void remove(String name) {
114        synchronized (channels) {
115            channels.remove(name);
116        }
117    }
118
119    /**
120     * Returns a read only view of this channel manager. The `channel`
121     * methods behave similar to the {@link #get(Object)} method and
122     * the {@link #remove(String)} method does nothing. 
123     *
124     * @return the channel manager
125     */
126    public ChannelManager<K, C> readOnly() {
127        if (readOnly == null) {
128            readOnly = new ChannelManager<>(supplier) {
129
130                @Override
131                public Optional<C> get(K key) {
132                    return ChannelManager.this.get(key);
133                }
134
135                @Override
136                public Optional<C> channel(K key) {
137                    return ChannelManager.this.get(key);
138                }
139
140                @Override
141                public Optional<C> channel(K key, Function<K, C> supplier) {
142                    return ChannelManager.this.get(key);
143                }
144
145                @Override
146                public void remove(String name) {
147                    // Do nothing
148                }
149
150                @Override
151                public ChannelManager<K, C> readOnly() {
152                    return ChannelManager.this.readOnly();
153                }
154            };
155        }
156        return readOnly;
157    }
158}
